channel.title: [Cleaned PI] Looking for developers
channel.description: [i][u][b]Looking to establish a development team and build a clean pi ground up with me. Looking to add a good bit. A few examples. Looking to reduce lag's and spikes. Looking to add custom ranks. Looking to add custom Minigames. Adding Treasure Trails Complete Fix for all Skilling. Add nice interfaces. Nothing to drastic though i personally am a fan of old rs. MAIN THING IS TO PERFECT AND MAKE SERVER FLAWLESS NO DUPES/BUGS/GLITCHES ETC. Some Weapons are to be tweaked aswell. Its a clean PI if you require screenies post and i will put some up..[/b][/u][/i]

item.title: [Cleaned PI] Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @Twist3dd Twist3dd
item.description:
@Twist3dd wrote:

well i know all will have lag but goal is to reduce it as much as possible.

edit: Still needing developers.

item.title: [Cleaned PI] Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I honestly hate to say this but the only way to keep from having lag on a PI is to have zero content whatsoever. To not have to do this you would have to start from the framework and then if you did that it wouldn’t even be a pi then

Read full topic

item.title: [Cleaned PI] Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @Twist3dd Twist3dd
item.description:
@Twist3dd wrote:

Looking to establish a development team and build a clean pi ground up with me.
Looking to add a good bit. A few examples.
Looking to reduce lag’s and spikes.
Looking to add custom ranks.
Looking to add custom Minigames.
Adding Treasure Trails
Complete Fix for all Skilling.
Add nice interfaces.
Nothing to drastic though i personally am a fan of old rs.
MAIN THING IS TO PERFECT AND MAKE SERVER FLAWLESS
NO DUPES/BUGS/GLITCHES ETC.
Some Weapons are to be tweaked aswell.
Its a clean PI if you require screenies post and i will put some up…
